{"id":521989684,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2 years, 5 months","timestamp":1626195392,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"8 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/521989684/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Zigzag Conversion","memory":"10.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    string convert(string s, int numRows) {\n        int n=s.size();\n        int i=0;\n        vector<string>v(numRows,\"\");\n        while(i<n)\n        {\n            for(int j=0;j<numRows&&i<n;j++)\n                v[j].push_back(s[i++]);\n            for(int j=numRows-2;j>=1&&i<n;j--)\n                v[j].push_back(s[i++]);\n        }\n            string res=\"\";\n            for(auto i:v)\n                res+=i;\n            return res;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"zigzag-conversion","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
